name: mymusic
description: A basic music app based on electron
author: Abhay

scripts.package: npm run package-mac && npm run package-win
scripts.package-mac: rm -rf dist/MyMusic-darwin-x64 && npx electron-packager . MyMusic --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon ./asserts/icon.icns --out dist && npx electron-installer-dmg dist/MyMusic-darwin-x64/MyMusic.app MyMusic --out dist --overwrite
scripts.package-win: rm -rf dist/MyMusic-win32-x64 && npx electron-packager . MyMusic --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out dist
